channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JAMES-1981] Impossible to move/delete a mail in certain conditions
item.description:
Fails indexing with such stacktrace:
```
17:50:01.933 [ERROR] o.a.j.m.e.e.ElasticSearchListeningMessageSearchIndex - Error when updating index on mailbox a70dea10-f3a1-11e6-88e7-ddd22b16a7b9
```

item.summary: Impossible to move/delete a mail in certain conditions

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: https://github.com/linagora/james-project/pull/719 solved the issue
